channel.title: Good Song?
channel.description:
Bon Jovi - Wanted Dead Or Alive
It's all the same, only the names will change Everyday it seems we're wasting away Another place where the faces are so cold I'd drive all night just to get back home
[Chorus:] I'm a cowboy, on a steel horse I ride I'm wanted dead or alive I'm a cowboy Wanted dead or alive
Sometimes I sleep, sometimes it's not for days And the people I meet always go their separate ways Sometimes you tell the day By the bottle that you drink And times when you're alone all you do is think
[Chorus]
I walk these streets, a loaded six string on my back I play for keeps, 'cause I might not make it back I been everywhere, and I'm standing tall I've seen a million faces an I've rocked them all
I'm a cowboy, on a steel horse I ride I'm wanted dead or alive I'm a cowboy, I got the night on my side I'm wanted dead or alive And I ride, dead or alive I still drive, dead or alive Dead or alive [x4]
Do you like this song?

item.title: Good Song?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Heh, not really.
I’m not a big Bon Jove fan, only like the song about building homes.

This song would come up whenever I searched “Dead Or Alive” on yt{band name}

Read full topic

item.title: Good Song?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Bon Jovi - Wanted Dead Or Alive

It’s all the same, only the names will change
Everyday it seems we’re wasting away
Another place where the faces are so cold
I’d drive all night just to get back home

[Chorus:]
I’m a cowboy, on a steel horse I ride
I’m wanted dead or alive
I’m a cowboy
Wanted dead or alive

Sometimes I sleep, sometimes it’s not for days
And the people I meet always go their separate ways
Sometimes you tell the day
By the bottle that you drink
And times when you’re alone all you do is think

[Chorus]

I walk these streets, a loaded six string on my back
I play for keeps, 'cause I might not make it back
I been everywhere, and I’m standing tall
I’ve seen a million faces an I’ve rocked them all

I’m a cowboy, on a steel horse I ride
I’m wanted dead or alive
I’m a cowboy, I got the night on my side
I’m wanted dead or alive
And I ride, dead or alive
I still drive, dead or alive
Dead or alive [x4]

Do you like this song?
